org.modelio.vbasic.log

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.vbasic.log.Log

  • public class Log
extends Object
    This class provides a simple logging facility that can be completely disabled at compilation time, leaving absolutely no overhead in the code. Inspired by: "MinLog: A low overhead, lightweight logging system." by Nathan Sweet Usage: 
     if (Log.ENABLED) Log.error("An error message...");

    IMPORTANT NOTE:
    To benefit from the absence of overhead when ENABLED is compiled to 'false', any logging statement MUST be guarded by a 'if (Log.ENABLED)' condition.
